task.title: Updating the ZooKeeper image on ensemble nodes

taskbody.prereq: Perform the steps in before performing this procedure.
taskbody.context: Use this procedure to install a new Docker image for ZooKeeper on ZooKeeper ensemble nodes.

step.cmd: Log in to the master host .
Identify the hosts in the ZooKeeper ensemble.
step.stepresult: The result is a list of 3 or 5 hosts, separated by the comma character (,). The master host is always a node in the ZooKeeper ensemble.

step.cmd: Log in to a ZooKeeper ensemble node .

step.info: Image extraction begins when you press the y key.

step.cmd: Repeat the preceding four steps on each delegate that is a node in the ZooKeeper ensemble.
